channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CoffeeSpace is a Hinge-like app that wants to help you find your co-founder
item.description: CoffeeSpace is on a mission to help people find partners for their startup ideas online. The startup, which exhibited as part of the Startup Battlefie...

item.title: How a PhD Student Discovered a Lost Mayan City From Hundreds of Miles Away
item.description: WIRED spoke with the researchers responsible for the discovery of Valeriana, a lost Maya city in the middle of the jungle of Campeche.

item.title: Best 5 Soda Makers for Sparkling Water (2024)
item.description: These are the best bubblers we've found for fresh carbonation at a moment's notice.

item.title: MIT debuts a large language model-inspired method for teaching robots new skills
item.description: MIT this week showcased a new model for training robots. Rather than the standard set of focused data used to teach robots new tasks, the method goes ...

item.title: Best MacBooks (2024): Which Model Should You Buy?
item.description: New MacBooks are here. Having a hard time choosing which Apple laptop to buy? Let us help.

item.title: Quantum Machines and Nvidia use machine learning to get closer to an error-corrected quantum computer

item.title: How to Choose a Router (2024): Tips, Technical Terms, and Advice
item.description: How much speed do you need? And what’s a MU-MIMO? We decipher the jargon and explain what to look for.

item.title: Can you build a startup without sacrificing your mental health? Bonobos founder Andy Dunn thinks so

item.title: Best Organic Mattress & Bedding of 2024: Nontoxic, Natural Sleep
item.description: These nontoxic beds and bedsheets are easier on the environment and your health—and they feel like a dream.

item.title: Why Wiz really turned down Google’s $23B offer
